holdValidItemMessage: You must hold a valid pipe item in your off-hand
UpSideNotAllowedMessage: You can't connect a pipe to the top of a block
usageExplanation: Shift + Right-Click on Blocks will set positions
CancelSelectionExplanation: Shift + Right-Click on Air will cancel selection
changeDepthExplanation: Shift + Scroll wheel to change Pipe depth
